text: Richard John Burde (July 29, 1871 – December 17, 1954) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of British Columbia from 1919 to 1928 from the electoral district of Alberni, as an Independent Liberal.http://www.albernivalleynews.com/lifestyles/138609864.html ==References== Category:Independent MLAs in British Columbia Category:1871 births Category:1954 deaths Category:People from Muskegon County, Michigan Category:American emigrants to Canada
title: Richard John Burde
